title: Top Golf Mansion
description: It's time to clear the docket with Guest Bailiff Jean Grae! Jean and Judge Hodgman discuss beans on display, grammar correcting, Top Golf competition, wedding dress donating, and complicated pizza math!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
